title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, May 20, 2020
description: On this day in 1946, English-born poet W.H. Auden became a U.S. citizen. He’d first moved there in 1939, and he lived for a time with artists such as Carson McCullers.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
